Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the interior is covered with a discoloured red slip and traces of a brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-slip and remains of two incised Coptic characters.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394356) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394356)
